txt.en: 'I'll miss my old friend Cal. He insisted on being buried in the old graveyard. He said it was the way of his people.'
'He was a man grown and friends with my father when I was a girl. I know not how old he was when he finally passed.'
'Old Cal would often meet with the strange, wandering people. Folks around here call them Rangers.'
'Cal's wisdom and advice will be sorely missed by many a people in Bree-land.'
